name: Fond Memeories
description:
WARNING:

This game may contain material that is not suitable for children and sensitive adults. Use caution when playing dating games about memes. I mean, it isn't XXX or R18+, but it has cursing and mild naughty-bits. Lots of masturbating. Sorry.

ALSO, DISCLAIMER:

I own nothing but the code, photoshopped images, and idea of the whole game. All of the pictures and music are free to use and easy to find on Renpy's boards. All of the music is from Creative Commons approved/liked/whatever'd websites.

STORY: Life was beginning to become unbearable for Feels Guy… He lived every boring day with no gf. But that all changed when he moved and enrolled in Kawaiigauken High School! Play as Feels Guy on his quest to find gf, friends, and political balance!

FEATURES:

  • TWO (2!) endings per character PLUS A NEUTRAL ROUTE.
  • HUNDREDS OF MEMES
  • RARE PEPES
  • SOFT COMMUNISM
  • HENTAI
  • UNHOLY USE OF COMIC SANS
  • MULTIPLE DIALOGUE CHOICES THAT WILL ALTER THE GAME DRAMATICALLY
  • OTOME MEME ROMANCE
  • BISHES
  • KAWAII-ASS FUCKING LINGO
  • RARE AND COMMON PEPES
  • THOUSANDS OF LINES OF CODE*
  • SONGS FROM CREATIVE COMMONS SOUND WEBSITES
  • HUNDREDS OF TYPOS
  • TRIGGERS

FOND MEMEORIES IS A FREE GAME THAT WILL BE RELEASED ON MAC, PC, LINUX AND ANDROID! IT IS DRM FREE, DLC FREE, AND JUST FUCKING FREE OF EVERYTHING.

IT TOOK LIKE FOUR MONTHS TO GET THE MOTIVATION TO FINISH THE GAME, AND IT IS STILL INCOMPLETE.

RELEASE DATE: SUMMER 2015 ON ALL PLATFORMS**

* some lines only have one word on them

** available on Android via .apk only

UPDATE SEPT. 23, 2015: I am releasing the game, unfinished, on Windows, Mac and Linux. I want to finish the game, and most of it is complete. The final episode/final scenes are not though. I want to make them, but I just don't have the motivation to. Depending on the reception as an unfinished game, I might re-release the finished version of the game. I don't know yet. We will see. For now just download it I guess.
